src:
VIDEO: Tega v legendarnem Titaniku ne boste videli
Ustvarili so parodije filmske uspešnice.
01 Nov 2019, 13:22 by M. U.



V glavnih vlogah sta nastopila Kate Winslet in Leonardo DiCaprio kot Rose DeWitt Bukater in Jack Dawson. FOTO: Youtube



V glavnih vlogah sta nastopila Kate Winslet in Leonardo DiCaprio kot Rose DeWitt Bukater in Jack Dawson. FOTO: Youtube


Eden najuspešnejših filmov vseh časov je bil Titanic iz leta 1997, ki je prejel 11 oskarjev, govori pa o potopitvi ladje, ki je veljala za nepotopljivo. Film je režiral James Cameron.


V glavnih vlogah sta nastopila Kate Winslet in Leonardo DiCaprio kot Rose DeWitt Bukater in Jack Dawson. FOTO: Youtube

V glavnih vlogah sta nastopila Kate Winslet in Leonardo DiCaprio kot Rose DeWitt Bukater in Jack Dawson, pripadnika različnih družbenih razredov, ki sta se na ladji na njeni prvi in zadnji vožnji leta 1912 usodno zaljubita.



Zdaj prihaja nadaljevanje legendarnega Titanika. Kaj se bo dogajalo v drugem delu? Poglejte posnetek, ki je seveda parodija …
text:
VIDEO: You won't see that in the legendary Titanic
They created parodies of the hit movie.
01 Nov 2019, 12:22 by M. U.



Starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio as Rose DeWitt Bukater and Jack Dawson. PHOTO: Youtube



Starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio as Rose DeWitt Bukater and Jack Dawson. PHOTO: Youtube


One of the most successful films of all time was the 1997 Titanic, which received 11 Oscars, and it talks about the sinking of a ship that was considered unsinkable. The film is directed by James Cameron.


Starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio as Rose DeWitt Bukater and Jack Dawson. PHOTO: Youtube

Starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio as Rose DeWitt Bukater and Jack Dawson, members of different social classes, who each fall in love with each other on board on her first and last voyage in 1912.



Now comes the sequel to the legendary Titanic. What will happen in part two? Look at the clip, which is of course a parody ...
